segments.text: It's striking to see the calm garden through the window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The neatly trimmed bushes and clear path create such a serene view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the small-scale chaos unfolding inside this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, everything appears tranquil and well-maintained.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, water is flowing everywhere, and children are risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunbeams through those small window panes almost mock the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone out there would believe what's happening indoors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost as if the outside world is completely separate from this domestic mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of how peaceful it looks outside makes the indoor mess even more unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a pleasant view, while destruction quietly ensues within these walls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a strange duality, this perfect garden against the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would just look out the window for a moment, find some calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Perhaps she'd notice the floor if she broke her concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR
